reviewText: Camilla Lackgerg's books are great reading! Looking forward to an English subtitled DVD to buy!The Preacher: A Novel (Pegasus Crime) Now that so many of the Scandinavian author's books are selling so well in the USA and Canada...........let's see some English subtitles with DVD's! The success of The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo was a sensation! There's more money where that came from! USA
